synonyms: sat-cit-ānanda-deha—transcendental, blissful, spiritual body; pūrṇa-brahma-svarūpa—the identification of the Absolute Truth; sarva-ātmā—all-pervading; sarva-jña—omniscient; nitya—eternal; sarva-ādi—the origin of everything; svarūpa—the real form of the Lord.
translation: "According to the Koran, the Lord has a supreme, blissful, transcendental body. He is the Absolute Truth, the all-pervading, omniscient and eternal being. He is the origin of everything.
